Purpose: To measure immunoglobulin E (IgE) levels specific to Sweet Gum (Liquidambar styraciflua) allergen in serum samples.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or plain red-top tube
Equipment: ELISA plate reader, ELISA washer, precision pipettes, microcentrifuge, incubator, vortex mixer, refrigerator (2–8 °C), freezer (-20 °C or lower)
